library(gsDesign)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
library(testthat)
library(tibble)
devtools::load_all()

# Binary Endpoint {.tabset}

## `gsdmvn`

```{r, eval=FALSE}
x <- gs_design_rd(
  p_c = tibble::tibble(Stratum = "All", Rate = .28),
  p_e = tibble::tibble(Stratum = "All", Rate = .4),
  k = 1,
  rd0 = 0, 
  alpha = 0.025,   
  beta = 0.1,   
  ratio = 1,
  weight = "un-stratified",
  upper = gs_b,
  lower = gs_b,
  upar = list(par = -qnorm(.025)),
  lpar = list(par = -Inf))  

cat("The sample size calculated by `gs_design_rd()` is ", x$analysis$N, "\n")
```


## `gsDesign`
```{r}
x <- nBinomial(p1 = .28, p2 = .4, delta0 = 0, alpha = .025, sided = 1, beta = .1, outtype = 3)
cat("The sample size calculated by `gsDesign` is ", x$n, "\n")
```
